Hi All,

It's been asserted that the following is RESTful, so I thought it may be 
more beneficial to get the REST communities feedback on this particular 
'REST API'.

Hugh Glaser wrote:
> I don't know if it is written anywhere, but there seems to me a bit of a consensus around this.
> And it is folded into the RESTful stuff.
> So for example
> http://kmi-web05.open.ac.uk/REST_API.html
> describes a typical service invocation with a URI as argument as:

Would anybody like to comment on whether they feel this is RESTful, 
noting any REST mismatches they can see.

Best,

Nathan
